book.synopsis: A champion of the human spirit, Henry David Thoreau is a true American mystic. Walden, which celebrated its 150th anniversary in 2004, continues to be one of the most familiar and widely published books in America. Thoreau"s writings have also coined countless colloquialisms that have become commonplace in our language, among them,
